bug.author: Julianxo
bug.summary: Dashboard deployed on eks does not show manage contributors in navigation
bug.description:
/kind bug
I followed the tutorial for AWS setup on this page <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/aws/deploy/install-kubeflow/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/aws/deploy/install-kubeflow/</denchmark-link> . I also followed this tutorial to setup TLS and AWS Cognito. I can register users and i can login (logout is not possible because of a missing logout button). But i do not see the "Manage Contributers" link in the menu like mentioned here. <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/aws/authentication/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/aws/authentication/</denchmark-link>
What did you expect to happen: I except the "Manage Contributers" to show up.
[Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] I found a similar bug report here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/4113>#4113</denchmark-link>
But I did not get how this was solved. Environment:
Kubeflow version: I tested 0.7.0 and 0.7.1 kfctl version: (use kfctl version): v0.7.1-2-g55f9b2a Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube): AWS EKS Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): Client 1.16, Server 1.14 OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): macOS Mojave 10.14.6

comments.comment:
Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the labels:

kind/bug 0.97
Please mark this comment with or to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-botdata/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Julianxo>@Julianxo</denchmark-link> Hi AWS doesn't have this supported in 0.7, we will resolve this in 1.0 which will be officially released soon. If people still want to use it in 0.7, I will consider to cherry-pick back the changes
I can confirm that it is fixed in version 1.0
